title: Mother, 27, ‘let pedophile friend, 64, rape her two young daughters for years’
text:
Sarena Hall has been accused of letting family friend Marion Stang, right, rape her two young daughters, both of whom are under 10 years old (Pictures: Facebook/Stark County Jail)

A 27 year-old mother allowed a 64 year-old ‘family friend’ to rape her two young daughters for years, police say.

Sarena Hall, of Green in Ohio, reportedly let Marion Stang sexually abuse her daughters ‘for a few years.’

Both girls are still aged under 10 years old.

Hall and Stang were both arrested by FBI agents on Thursday after the local Child Protective Services department received a call expressing ‘concern’ for Hall’s children.

It is unclear what prompted the call, or who made it.

Hall is said to have begun allowing Stang to begin abusing her children ‘a few years ago.’ The alleged abuse was finally exposed after a concerned tipster alerted social services to fears they had for the youngsters (Picture: Stark County Jail)

But social workers investigated the tip-off, and were sufficiently disturbed by what they uncovered to notify law enforcement officials.

Hall describes herself as a ‘stay at home mom’ on her Facebook page.

Dog named Clifford spent five long days trapped on steep cliff face

She made multiple posts hailing her partner and fiance, and painted herself as a loving wife as well as mother.

But in 2016 Hall showed a flash of bad temper after posting an angry cryptic status which read: ‘Ridiculous.. Its funny seeing with my own eyes..

‘Really grow up put your big kid pants on and learn some respect..

‘All i have to say is…HOW DARE YOU DISRESPECT ME.. you have done it for the last fucking time..’

Hall has been charged with two felony counts of endangering children, the Akron Beacon-Journal reported.

Meanwhile, Stang faces multiple charges of rape and gross sexual imposition.

Both are currently being held in Stark County Jail without bond awaiting a preliminary court hearing, a date for which is yet to be set.
description: Sarena Hall of Uniontown in Ohio reportedly let pal Marion Stang abuse her two daughters for 'a few years'
